net.sf.javaml.clustering.evaluation

Interface ClusterEvaluation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AICScore, BICScore, CIndex, Gamma, GPlus, HybridCentroidSimilarity, HybridPairwiseSimilarities, MinMaxCut, PointBiserial, SumOfAveragePairwiseSimilarities, SumOfCentroidSimilarities, SumOfSquaredErrors, Tau, TraceScatterMatrix, WB

    public interface ClusterEvaluation
    This interface provides a frame for all measure that can be used to evaluate the quality of a clusterer.
    Author:
    Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean compareScore(double score1, double score2)
      Compares the two scores according to the criterion in the implementation.
      double score(Dataset[] clusters)
      Returns the score the current clusterer obtains on the dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        double score(Dataset[] clusters)
        Returns the score the current clusterer obtains on the dataset.
        Parameters:
        data - the original data
        d - the dataset to test the clusterer on.
        Returns:
        the score the clusterer obtained on this particular dataset

      • compareScore

        boolean compareScore(double score1,
                   double score2)
        Compares the two scores according to the criterion in the implementation. Some score should be maxed, others should be minimized. This method returns true if the second score is 'better' than the first score.
        Parameters:
        score1 - the first score
        score2 - the second score
        Returns:
        true if the second score is better than the first, false in all other cases
